title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, September 22, 2021
description: On this day in 1862 President Abraham Lincoln signed his preliminary Emancipation Proclamation. It did not not free all slaves, only those within the confederacy.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1862 President Abraham Lincoln signed his preliminary Emancipation Proclamation. It did not not free all slaves, only those within the confederacy.
